tool_description: Get access to publicly accessible Rakuten Kobo Book data through our API! Simply extract data using a URL or an ISBN.
name: Kobo
title: Kobo

api_list.name: Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results from Keyword and Filters

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Language Code
Can be obtained through the **Languages** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- AverageRating
- NumPurchases
- PriceAsc
- AuthorAsc
- AuthorDesc
- TitleAsc
- TitleDesc
- PublicationDateAsc
- PublicationDateDesc
- Temperature

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kobo3.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kobo3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kobo3.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kobo3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: extractURL
api_list.description: Extract Data from a URL, can be a search results URL, a book details URL, and an author page URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Possible URL Types:

- Search Results Page URL (Works with filters)
- Author Page URL
- Book Details Page URL

api_list.name: Get Book By URL
Get Book By ISBN
api_list.description: Get Book Data from Kobo using an ISBN
